content.text: SNIPER: net-discover - Local Network Discovery Tool

text: An all-in-one local network discovery tool. It performs a quick scan on the
local subnet to find connected devices and displays their IP and MAC addresses.

content.text: Requires the [bold red]nmap[/] command-line tool to be installed on your system. It is used as the backend for the network scan.

text: The tool automatically determines your local subnet (e.g., 192.168.1.0/24)
and performs a ping scan ([cyan]nmap -sn[/]) to discover live hosts.
[green]-o, --output <file>[/]   Save the list of found devices to a file.
